name: NPR
text:
JUST IN: The House has approved wide-ranging legislation aimed at overhauling law enforcement departments following the police killing of George Floyd.

The bill is not expected to move in the GOP-led Senate.

In a newly announced rule, Education Secretary Betsy DeVos has signaled she is standing firm on her intention to reroute millions of dollars in coronavirus aid money to K-12 private school students.
